channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Another street light not working, 6th November
item.description:
Hi, the street light over the road from another non-working street light is also out. Address is Belgrave Hotel, 80-86 Belgrave Rd, Pimlico, London SW1V 2BJ Both sides of the road now have no street lighting which presents danger.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80-86, Belgrave Road, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement not put back correctly after cabkes openreach, 6th November
item.description:
Manhole cover paving slabs very loose after openreach works outside 187 upland road dangerous someone could fall
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Crebor Street, East Dulwich, London

item.title: Lampost light not working, 6th November
item.description:
Several weeks now light from central lampost in the street has not been working. Needs new bulb or other work. Lack of light dangerous particularly for who lives in basement or older people.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Denbigh Place, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 Chatsworth Road, 6th November
item.description:
In the past months, leaves have been steadily accumulating along Chatsworth Road, and no street cleaning has been carried out. There is now an incredible amount of leaves covering the pavement and road, making the area quite untidy and potentially slippery. Could you please arrange for a thorough cleaning as soon as possible?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking of cars during daytime on this main path to the park, 6th November
item.description:
Around 6 or so cars are consistently now being parking on the path and verge of this footpath. This is obstructing the pathway and creating a danger to users. They need to be fined and removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glyn Avenue, New Barnet, London

item.title: Rubbish bag by lamp post at 9pm from 83 great Titchfield street, 6th November
item.description:
3 bags dumped by cleaner at 9pm collection will not happen this evening, not sure why businesses are allowed to leave bags out in this street for hours and sometimes days , can the WCC speak with the businesses, thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Gosfield Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster

item.title: Missed communal bins collection, 6th November
item.description:
4 blue communal bins at Ian Court SE23 2PB not emptied on Tuesday 4 Nov 2025. Reported to Lewisham Council Reference CAS-4419653-Q9Z5N8 that afternoon at the time suggested on the webpage. No resulting action. All four bins now full to the brim, two have lids poking up. No space for the weekend's rubbish.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ian Court, Forest Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
